title: FS T207 Ty Cobb Greenback PSA 1

posts.post_title: FS T207 Ty Cobb Greenback PSA 1
posts.post_content:
All SOLD!

I am going to be separating the the cobbs from the set I'm selling. I will sell all four in one sale or sell them separately. 
Payment method: Venmo / Paypal, Cashiers check or bank wire is fine too. If your close i will consider meeting you.
No trades please. I'm only selling to upgrade my current set.

References are available upon request. I have purchased cards from a couple members here but am still relatively new.

Cobb Green back/ piedmont 1: $1975 sold
Cobb Red back/sweet caporal 1: $1750 sold
Cobb bat on shoulder sweet caporal/ 2mk: sold 
Cobb bat off shoulder/ old mill (A): $1600 sold

Or I will sell all four in a package for a cheaper price.

Thanks for looking.
Pm sent on the Bat off A
All PMs replied to.. All cards are still available. bump for Saturday evening.
Deal for "Cobb On Shoulder" to me pending PayPal information and payment tomorrow.
Ok we are down to Red and Green Cobb. Please send over offers! I'm willing to deal gentlemen!

posts.post_title: Prices lowered on green and red

posts.post_content: Sunday Bump. Price lowered . Green Cobb is still left
